Margin.description: Turn Start: If this unit has less than 4 pages in hand, draw 1 page, restore 1 light and gain 1 Clash Power Up

In Times Like These!.description: Turn Start: If this unit has less than 4 pages in hand, draw 1 page and gain 1 Power Up

Commander.description: 0n Turn Start: 3 random allies gain 1 Clash Power Up

Effloresced E.G.O : Commandeering.description: On Hit With Commandeering: Deal 5 Bonus Pierce Damage, and all allies heal 5 HP and gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn

Delle Lacrime Stage 1 - Combat.description: This unit's HP does not go below 1. When at 1 HP, retreat the encounter.

Nightlong.description: If this combat is 'Lights Out', obfuscate the names of all pages

Hana Association's Commemorative Brooch:.description: Turn Start: Draw 1 page, and restore 1 light
Increase this unit's HP and Stagger by 10%

Lowstrider.description: On Hit with a Pierce Die, 70% chance to inflict 1 Pierce Fragility

Unseen Threat.description:
Turn Start: When Lights Out is active, activate the following effects:
- Lower the Cost of all pages in hand by 1
- Gain (Pages in hand / 2) Pierce Damage Up (max 3)
- All opponents gain 1 Bind next turn

None Left Behind.description: On Kill: Gain 3 Offense Level Up next turn (Max 3 times per encounter

Gashing Wounds.description: Upon inflicting bleed against enemies with 10+ Bleed, 50% chance to inflict +1 additional Bleed.

Parasitism.description: On Hit: If target has Sinking, 50% chance to heal (Sinking damage dealt) Stagger.

Trailblazer.description:
For every 10 Burn on the target, enemy Wrath Resistance +0.1 (Max +0.6)
For every 5 Burn on self, Wrath Resistance -0.1 on self (Max -0.6)

Scorching Passion.description: Turn Start: Heal HP equal to (Burn on self - 3) (Min 0)

Accurate Slice.description: When landing a critical hit, deal +3 damage

Imperfect Battery.description: When spending Charge, inflict an additional (Charge Count on self / 4) damage. At 20+ Charge Count, inflict an additional 3 damage

Gluttonous Exploitation.description:
On Roll: If the target has Rupture and this unit is using an Offensive dice, deal +1 HP damage
On Roll: If the target has Rupture and this unit is using a Defensive Dice, deal +1 stagger damage

Reshuffle.description: Turn Start: Discard 1 random page and draw 1 page

First Impressions [頼む].description: Encounter Start: Gain 3 Poise and +3 Poise Count. Whenever this unit has over +20 Poise, gain +1 Min. Speed and 1 Haste at the start of each turn.

Accursed Blade - Untrained [悪魔祓い].description: Against opponents who have over +4 types of status effect, deal 20% more damage.

Reaction Force.description: Turn Start: If this unit did not use any page last scene, gain 1 Power Up and Protection

Poison-tipped Muscleripper.description: On Crit: If target has Poison, gain 1 Poise and inflict 1 Rupture

Toxicant Breath.description: On Hit: If target has 5+ Poison, gain 3 Poise and +2 Poise Count

Full Throttle.description:
At the start of the encounter, start the battle with +3  Charge Count.
When gaining Charge, 10% chance to gain an additional +1 Charge Count.
On Clash Win, deal additional stagger damage equal to (Charge Count / 5).

Complete Drive.description: Turn Start: Draw an additional page equal to (Charge Count/10)

Overhead.description: On Hit: If target has 10+ Tremor, deal 1 damage

Tremor Kick-Back.description: When triggering Tremor Burst, gain 2 Stagger Protection and 2 Blunt Stagger Damage Down

Tremor Recoil.description: When triggering Tremor Burst, gain 2 Blunt Stagger Damage Up and 2 Stagger Fragile

Supressed Recoil.description: When triggering Tremor Burst, gain 1 Stagger Protection and 1 Stagger Damage Up (Max 2)

Shaking Advantage.description: At the start of each turn, if every opponent on the field has Tremor, gain 1 Haste

Hematolagnia.description: On Kill with an opponent who has +5 Bleed, heal back 10% of Max HP

Barbaric Terror.description: Opponents who have above +5 at turn start and Lose 1 Speed

Acrotomophilia.description: On Kill with an opponent who has +5 Rupture, heal back 10% of Max HP

Fear Inducing Terror.description: Opponents who have above +5 Rupture at turn start and Lose 1 Speed

Desecrate Carcass.description: Deal 5% more damage against opponents with Rupture, Deal 5% more damage against opponents with Bleed

Enticing Rampage.description: After using the combat page 'DIE DIE DIE', a random ally gains 'DIE DIE DIE' in their current hand.

Rats Guide to Survival.description: Deal 10% more damage towards opponents with Bleed. On Evade, heal +2 more stagger.

Instant Cooking.description: On Kill, restore 10% of Max HP and Max SR.

Marbling.description: If the target has a total of cumulative of 20 Bleed, deal 35% more damage.

Inherited Cruelty.description: When attacking an opponent with Bleed, deal a quarter of the damage dealt as Fixed Lust Damage. When this unit is staggered for the first time, unstagger self

log.text: <:stagger:1390624005593239643> Jeanne Has Been Unstaggered! ('Inherited Cruelty' Passive Activationn) <:stagger:1390624005593239643>

Effloresced E.G.O - Nagao.description: All opponent's Lose 5 Defensive Dice power while this unit is present on the field. Against opponents with slower speed, gain Dice Power equal to (# of the sum of Poise and Poise Count on this unit/Speed Difference x 5 (rounded up)).Deal 50% more damage on critical hits. When this unit has over 50 (# of the sum of Poise and Poise Count on this unit, automatically Invoke all dices on all pages. Afterwards, discard all pages from hand and gain a new selection. Their costs become 0.

Severing Slash [未実践].description: This unit's slash resistance counts as 1.5X towards opponents who have over 1.4X slash resistance. Against opponents who have lower than 1.0X Slash Resistance, deal 50% more damage with Slash Dice.

Divine Polarity.description: Upon Recieving Fatal Damage, Polarize Own HP

log.text: POLARITY HAS INVERSED ITS OWN HP

Southern Winds.description: On Round Start,For all enemies, 50% chance to Polarize the type resistances, 50% chance to polarize Sin Resistances (Not Mutually Exclusive Or Grouped)

Northern Lights.description: On Round Start, For all enemies, 50% chance to Polarize the Light, 50% chance to Polarize Stagger (Not Mutually Exclusive Or Grouped)

Northern Lights E.G.O. Gift Effect.description: Whenever this unit falls below 20% HP, Polarize this unit's HP, Light and Stagger. Whenever this unit uses more than +3 Light with a skill while being less than 50% HP,25% chance to Polarize the opponent's HP.

Pages of Scorching Blades Effect.description: Heal HP equal to Burn stack on self - 3 (Min 0)

Ranged Proficiency.description: On Hit with a Dice that is ranged, Trigger Tremor Burst, if the target is staggered, Deal 5 Bonus Pierce Damage

The Commander.description: When Using Order Fire, Order up to 2 Random Allies with “Musket Fire” in Hand to attack the target using it again

Defending Prowess.description: On Discard: Apply 1 Protection and Stagger Protection next turn to a random ally

Attacking Prowess.description: On Discard: Apply 1 Clash Power Up next turn to a random ally

Blitzing Prowess.description: On Discard: Apply 1 Haste next turn to a random ally

Instructional Prowess.description: On Discard: Apply 1 Damage Up next turn to 2 random allies
